In the 12th District in North Carolina, women still make about 82 cents for every dollar a man makes. This is why I’m very proud to cast my vote for the #PaycheckFairness Act today!  We need equal pay for equal work!

Despite the decline in the farm economy & the rejection of these cuts in the 2018 Farm Bill, the #TrumpBudget slashes the USDA’s funding by 15 percent. These massive cuts will hurt hardworking American farmers and leave families and children hungry.
The #TrumpBudget is a disgrace. It would cut #SNAP by $17 billion next year alone, making poverty deeper and hunger and inequality more widespread in NC and across the country

It’s clear the President doesn’t understand that Medicare, Medicaid, SNAP & Social Security help families, children & elderly & disabled people across the country who are struggling to get by. The #TrumpBudget proves that the White House doesn't care about working #ForThePeople
